content.summary: A candidate with nearly 2 years of experience as a Programmer Analyst at Cognizant, Pune. Offering expertise in Quality Assurance processes and testing tools like Selenium, JIRA, SQL, Cucumber BDD, and Manual Testing. Possesses leadership skills, demonstrated by effective communication, fostering team collaboration, and making decisions to ensure project success.

experience.title: Programmer Analyst
responsibilities: Spearheaded data collection, analysis, and visualization initiatives
Designed and executed comprehensive test cases for various applications
Conducted schema testing to validate data integrity
Collaborated closely with clients to understand project expectations
Implemented quality assurance processes to ensure high-quality software solutions
Utilized automation testing tools to enhance testing processes
Implemented defect tracking tools for efficient bug identification and resolution
Conducted regression testing to identify and rectify software defects
Led user acceptance testing initiatives to gather feedback from stakeholders

projects.title: Identify Car Wash Services
projects.objectives: Automate the process of fetching details and managing alerts
projects.contributions: Developed a project utilizing Selenium testing technology

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: Graduated with a Bachelor of Technology in Electrical and Electronics from Oriental College of Technology, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India, in 2022
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Continuously expanding skill set through certifications and self-study
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Demonstrated leadership skills through effective communication, fostering team collaboration, and making decisions to ensure project success
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effective communication with clients and stakeholders
standout_traits: Proficient in quality assurance methodologies and best practices
Mastering the use of Selenium testing technology to streamline processes
